details:
Case 213 is an imported case involving a 48 year-old male Singapore Citizen who had been in Indonesia from 4 March to 13 March. He is currently warded in an isolation room at Sengkang General Hospital (SKH).

He reported onset of symptoms on 8 March while in Indonesia. He presented at the emergency department of SKH on 13 March. Subsequent test results confirmed COVID-19 infection on 14 March afternoon.

He stays at Serangoon North Avenue 3.
